meanings.definition: The pieces used in the game of chess.
meanings.sent1: During the game, the chessmen move strategically on the board.
meanings.sent2: She carefully arranged the chessmen on the board before starting the game.
meanings.sent3: The chessmen decided to rebel against the chessboard and go on strike.
meanings.sent4: The chessmen stood tall like warriors ready for battle on the board.
meanings.sent5: The shiny chessmen gleamed under the light, captivating all players.

meanings.sent1: The young chessmen practiced their moves diligently every day.
meanings.sent2: He was known as one of the best chessmen in the city.
meanings.sent3: The chessmen organized a tournament to find the ultimate champion.
meanings.sent4: She was a chessmen with a sharp mind and quick strategies.
meanings.sent5: The group of chessmen discussed their favorite chess strategies over lunch.
